TEI-REX Open Modification DDA Nextflow Documentation¶

This workflow will run the Open Modification Discovery DDA workflow developed as part of the IARPA TEI-REX project. Please use the links below to navigate to pages describing how to install and run the workflow, how to retrieve results, and how to set up AWS Batch to run the workflow in the cloud.

Getting Help, Providing Feedback, or Reporting Problems¶

If you need help, have ideas for new features, encounter a problem, or have any questions or comments, please contact Michael Riffle at mriffle@uw.edu.
